tables.layout:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_layout` (
  `layout_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `screen_size` enum('desktop','tablet','mobile') DEFAULT 'desktop',
  `is_active` int(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `page_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `template_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`layout_id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `page_id` (`page_id`,`template_id`,`screen_size`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.layout_block:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_layout_block` (
  `block_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `parent_block_id` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  `section_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `node_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `leaf_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `support_block_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `block_order` smallint(4) unsigned DEFAULT '1',
  `block_params_text` text NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`block_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.layout_page:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_layout_page` (
  `page_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `page_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `parent_page_name` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  `module_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `item_module_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'core',
  `page_params_text` text,
  `page_condition` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL,
  `is_admin` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `base_path` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `item_path` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`page_id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `page_name` (`page_name`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.layout_section:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_layout_section` (
  `section_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `layout_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `section_order` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `section_active` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `section_type` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `section_template` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `section_params_text` text,
  PRIMARY KEY (`section_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.layout_setting:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_layout_setting` (
  `setting_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `page_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `layout_type` enum('header','footer','content') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'content',
  `setting_params_text` text,
  `screen_size` enum('desktop','mobile','tablet') DEFAULT 'desktop',
  `is_active` int(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `template_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`setting_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.layout_support_block:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_layout_support_block` (
  `support_block_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `block_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `block_class` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,
  `base_path` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `item_path` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,
  `module_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `support_block_params_text` text,
  `block_type` enum('block','container') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'block',
  `editor_class` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`support_block_id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `block_class` (`block_class`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.layout_support_section:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_layout_support_section` (
  `support_section_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `support_section_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `support_section_order` smallint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  PRIMARY KEY (`support_section_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.layout_template:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_layout_template` (
  `template_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `template_name` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `parent_template_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `super_template_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`template_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.layout_theme:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_layout_theme` (
  `theme_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `parent_theme_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `author` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `is_active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `is_default` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `variable_params` text NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`theme_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
